item.title: Write Math Equations
item.description: Write math equations with ease. At first enable math:true in front matter. Then write this- $$ \varphi = \dfrac{1+\sqrt5}{2}= 1.6180339887… $$ to produce this- $$ \varphi = \dfrac{1+\sqrt5}{2}= 1.6180339887… $$ And write this- $$ \varphi = 1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\cdots} } } $$ to produce this- $$ \varphi = 1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\cdots} } } $$
